text: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ kupitā anattamanā saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ kupitā anattamanā saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 113. Should any bhikkhunī, angry and displeased, evict a bhikkhunī from a dwelling belonging to the Community — or have her evicted — it is to be confessed.
